title: How to Kill in Command and Conquer 3 Skirmishes

steps.headline: First you should get familiar with the controls and the production menus so that you can quickly pull up and select units as fast as possible.
Choose which faction is your favorite to use.
Find your favorite map to play.
steps.description: It can be Shooter Showdown. You should know where everything is in the map you use.

steps.headline: As soon as the skirmish starts, select your production structure(i.e.
steps.description: Construction Yard or Drone Ship) and immediately start building a power plant and a Surveyor.

steps.headline: Put the rally point for your Surveyor close to another tiberium field and unpack it as soon as possible.
Lay down your power plant and immediately start building a barracks.
Lay down your barracks and start pumping out troops that can destroy buildings easy and send them to where you know or think your enemy is.
While you wait for them to get there, start building a crane.
Lay the crane down and start building a refinery and a war factory.
Once your troops get to where they are going, attack their power plants.
steps.description: If he has a barracks, kill that first.

steps.headline: Back at your base, lay down your refinery and start building another one immediately.
steps.description: Lay your war factory down and pump out no less than 4 harvesters and then some anti-aircraft vehicles.

steps.headline: When your second refinery is done, lay it down next to the field that you sent your Surveyor to.
Start building your first advanced structure(i.e.
steps.description: Command Post, Nerve Center, etc. ),sell your barracks and build another war factory.

steps.headline: Set up your vehicles to protect your base and keep them there for now.
Lay down your advanced structure and second war factory and start building a tech center and another power plant.
steps.description: Your power plant will build a lot faster than your tech center so when it's done, build another power plant.

steps.headline: As soon as your tech center is done, lay it down along with your power plants and upgrade your power plants.
steps.description: Then start researching your vehicle upgrades.

steps.headline: This whole time you should have been pumping out all kinds of vehicles like crazy.
steps.description: As you build them, send them in waves to attack your enemy's base. This keeps him distracted and stunts his growth.

steps.headline: As soon as your tech center hits the ground you should go to the support tab and build your super-weapon control structure(i.e.
steps.description: Ion Control tower, Temple of Nod, Rift Generator. ), and start building your last advanced structure to get all your powers up and running.

steps.headline: Now comes crunch time.
Build a couple more power plants and upgrade them, then build no less than 3 more war factories and 4 more aircraft structures.
Start making bombing runs with your air support, and just keep sending tank after tank at them.
steps.description: If you so choose, you can try to build a barracks back up and produce a Commando to try to sneak in through the back door and take out a few structures on his own.

steps.headline: Basically, you are just waiting for your super-weapon to charge up so you can take out their main production structures.
steps.description: The first thing you want to do, and as soon as possible and get rid of his construction yard and cranes, then his power plants. Then, just go to town on the rest of what he has left,starting with his refineries. He won't be able to build anything extra, and he will have no power,and no money. That means that if you lose then, then he deserves to beat you.

steps.headline: Good luck!

text: First you should get familiar with the controls and the production menus so that you can quickly pull up and select units as fast as possible.  Choose which faction is your favorite to use. Suppose it is The Scrin. Find your favorite map to play. It can be Shooter Showdown. You should know where everything is in the map you use. As soon as the skirmish starts, select your production structure(i.e. Construction Yard or Drone Ship) and immediately start building a power plant and a Surveyor. Put the rally point for your Surveyor close to another tiberium field and unpack it as soon as possible.  Lay down your power plant and immediately start building a barracks.  Lay down your barracks and start pumping out troops that can destroy buildings easy and send them to where you know or think your enemy is.  While you wait for them to get there, start building a crane.  Lay the crane down and start building a refinery and a war factory.  Once your troops get to where they are going, attack their power plants. If he has a barracks, kill that first. Back at your base, lay down your refinery and start building another one immediately. Lay your war factory down and pump out no less than 4 harvesters and then some anti-aircraft vehicles. When your second refinery is done, lay it down next to the field that you sent your Surveyor to.  Start building your first advanced structure(i.e. Command Post, Nerve Center, etc. ),sell your barracks and build another war factory. Set up your vehicles to protect your base and keep them there for now.  Lay down your advanced structure and second war factory and start building a tech center and another power plant. Your power plant will build a lot faster than your tech center so when it's done, build another power plant. As soon as your tech center is done, lay it down along with your power plants and upgrade your power plants. Then start researching your vehicle upgrades. This whole time you should have been pumping out all kinds of vehicles like crazy. As you build them, send them in waves to attack your enemy's base. This keeps him distracted and stunts his growth. As soon as your tech center hits the ground you should go to the support tab and build your super-weapon control structure(i.e. Ion Control tower, Temple of Nod, Rift Generator. ), and start building your last advanced structure to get all your powers up and running. Now comes crunch time.  Build a couple more power plants and upgrade them, then build no less than 3 more war factories and 4 more aircraft structures. The more the merrier. Start making bombing runs with your air support, and just keep sending tank after tank at them. If you so choose, you can try to build a barracks back up and produce a Commando to try to sneak in through the back door and take out a few structures on his own. Basically, you are just waiting for your super-weapon to charge up so you can take out their main production structures. The first thing you want to do, and as soon as possible and get rid of his construction yard and cranes, then his power plants. Then, just go to town on the rest of what he has left,starting with his refineries. He won't be able to build anything extra, and he will have no power,and no money. That means that if you lose then, then he deserves to beat you. Good luck!
